text:
Beautiful concept, visually calming and yet stimulating. Solid cocktails were professionally done and tasted sharp - nothing watered down or too superficial.

Staff were friendly and nice - very pleasant experience overall!

A hidden cocktail bar at eco botanical park. The bar is located at first floor, and you need to ring the door bell for the metal door to be unlocked.

Once up the stairs, you will come into a nicely decorated space, with the logo of the bar, and you will be wondering if you are at the right place üòÜ

The door is hidden in the wall, on your left.

The bar is run by a young couple. You can order from the house menu or ask for bespoke creation. Just let them know your preferences.

The Hidden Bar is a stunning destination with remarkable art and interior design, infusing each moment with unique charm. I had an unforgettable birthday celebration there, and the atmosphere added incredible vibrancy to the gathering, making me feel like a VIP throughout the evening. Looking forward to returning for more top-notch service and delicious drinks. While the prices are on the higher side, the use of high-quality ingredients justifies the cost. The time spent at Hidden Bar is truly memorable and a place not to be missed.

MUST VISIT SPEAKEASY BAR!

The art and interior design were absolutely breathtaking, setting the mood for an unforgettable time. Melvrick and Bom, the super talented bartenders, totally nailed it with two drinks that were just perfect for me! They really brought the party with their lively vibes and made me feel like a VIP all night. Can't wait to come back for more of their top-notch service and fantastic drinks, even if they are a bit on the pricey side ‚Äì totally worth it for the high-quality ingredients they use. Cheers to an awesome experience! üçπüòÑ

It's so rare to find a speakeasy bar in Iskandar area. The bartenders were really friendly! The drinks were a bit pricey, but they were absolutely fantastic. Plus, you could customize them however you like!
